e: ￹`Ono~ `tireng~ `a~ `harateng~ `ko~ `tatooren~.￺One should follow one's own thinking.￻按照自己的意思去做
￹`Micomod~ `ko~ `tireng~ `nira~ `toya~ `pakayraan~.￺He has identified himself with that organization.￻他自己參加那個宗教組織
￹`Nima~ `a~ `tireng~ `ko~ `ma~`doka'~`ay~?￺Whose body got hurt?￻誰的身體受傷？
￹`Adada~ `ma~`emin~ `ko~ `tatirengan~ `ako~.￺My body aches all over.￻我全身都酸痛
d.f: ￹￺person * body of a living thing or inanimate object￻某人身體的有生命物體與無生命物體

e: ￹`Ka~`tomireng~ `han~ `ako~ `cingra~ `i~ `tireng~ `sa~`~ `ci~`nngra~.￺I told him to stand up and he stood up.￻我叫他站起來他就站起來
